 009: '''
 010: # Import math functions to work with complex numbers
 011: cdef extern from "complex.h":
 012:     np.complex128_t csqrt(np.complex128_t)
 013:     np.complex128_t ccos(np.complex128_t)
 014:     np.complex128_t cacos(np.complex128_t)
 015:     np.complex128_t cpow(np.complex128_t, np.complex128_t)

 018: @cython.cdivision(True)
 019: cdef (np.complex128_t, np.complex128_t) solve_quadratic_equation(
 020:     np.complex128_t a0,
 021:     np.complex128_t b0,
 022:     np.complex128_t c0
 023: ):
 024:     # a0 -> 1
 025:     cdef np.complex128_t a = b0 / a0
 026:     cdef np.complex128_t b = c0 / a0
 027: 
 028:     a0 = -0.5*a
 029:     cdef np.complex128_t delta = a0*a0 - b
 030:     cdef np.complex128_t sqrt_delta = csqrt(delta)
 031: 
 032:     return (a0 - sqrt_delta, a0 + sqrt_delta)
 033: 
 034: 
 035: @cython.cdivision(True)
 036: cdef np.complex128_t signed_cubic_root(np.complex128_t x):
 037:     if x.real >= 0:
 038:         return cpow(x, 1.0 / 3.0)
 039:     else:
 040:         return -cpow(-x, 1.0 / 3.0)
 041: 
 042: 
 043: @cython.cdivision(True)
 044: cdef np.complex128_t cubic_equation_real_root(
 045:     np.complex128_t a0,
 046:     np.complex128_t b0,
 047:     np.complex128_t c0,
 048:     np.complex128_t d0
 049: ):
 050:     # a0 -> 1
 051:     cdef np.complex128_t a = b0 / a0
 052:     cdef np.complex128_t b = c0 / a0
 053:     cdef np.complex128_t c = d0 / a0
 054: 
 055:     cdef np.complex128_t a13 = a / 3.0
 056:     cdef np.complex128_t a2 = a13*a13
 057:     cdef np.complex128_t f = b / 3.0 - a2
 058:     cdef np.complex128_t g = a13 * (2*a2 - b) + c
 059:     cdef np.complex128_t h = 0.25*g*g + f*f*f
 060:     
 061:     cdef np.complex128_t j, k, m, sqrt_h
 062:     if f == g and g == h and h == 0:
 063:         return -signed_cubic_root(c)
 064:     elif h.real <= 0:
 065:         j = csqrt(-f)
 066:         k = cacos(-0.5*g / (j*j*j))
 067:         m = ccos(k / 3.0)
 068:         return 2*j*m - a13
 069:     else:
 070:         sqrt_h = csqrt(h)
 071:         return signed_cubic_root(-0.5*g + sqrt_h) + signed_cubic_root(-0.5*g - sqrt_h) - a13
 072: 
 073: 
 074: @cython.cdivision(True)
 075: cdef (np.complex128_t, np.complex128_t, np.complex128_t, np.complex128_t) solve_quartic_equation(
 076:     np.complex128_t a0, 
 077:     np.complex128_t b0, 
 078:     np.complex128_t c0, 
 079:     np.complex128_t d0,
 080:     np.complex128_t e0
 081: ):
 082:     # a0 -> 1
 083:     cdef np.complex128_t a = b0 / a0
 084:     cdef np.complex128_t b = c0 / a0
 085:     cdef np.complex128_t c = d0 / a0
 086:     cdef np.complex128_t d = e0 / a0
 087: 
 088:     # Some repeating variables
 089:     a0 = 0.25*a
 090:     cdef np.complex128_t a02 = a0*a0
 091: 
 092:     # Coefficients of subsidiary cubic euqtion
 093:     cdef np.complex128_t p = 3*a02 - 0.5*b
 094:     cdef np.complex128_t q = a*a02 - b*a0 + 0.5*c
 095:     cdef np.complex128_t r = 3*a02*a02 - b*a02 + c*a0 - d
 096: 
 097:     # One root of the cubic equation
 098:     cdef np.complex128_t z0 = cubic_equation_real_root(1, p, r, p*r - 0.5*q*q)
 099: 
 100:     # Additional variables
 101:     cdef np.complex128_t s = csqrt(2*p + 2*z0.real)
 102:     cdef np.complex128_t t
 103:     if s == 0:
 104:         t = z0*z0 + r
 105:     else:
 106:         t = -q / s
 107: 
 108:     # Compute roots of quadratic equations
 109:     cdef np.complex128_t r0, r1, r2, r3
 110:     
 111:     r0, r1 = solve_quadratic_equation(1, s, z0 + t)
 112:     r2, r3 = solve_quadratic_equation(1, -s, z0 - t)
 113:     
 114:     return (r0 - a0, r1 - a0, r2 - a0, r3 - a0)
 115: 
 116: 
 117: @cython.cdivision(True)
 118: cdef (np.float64_t, np.float64_t, np.float64_t, np.float64_t) optimize_NLL_on_segment(
 119:     np.float64_t r_sum, np.float64_t r_l, np.float64_t r_h,
 120:     np.float64_t x_l, np.float64_t x_h,
 121:     np.float64_t x_sq_l, np.float64_t x_sq_h,
 122:     np.float64_t l_cur, np.float64_t l_next
 123: ):
 124:     cdef np.float64_t a = 1 / r_l + 1 / r_h
 125:     cdef np.float64_t b = x_h / r_h - x_l / r_l
 126:     cdef np.float64_t c = x_sq_l + x_sq_h - x_l**2 / r_l - x_h**2 / r_h
 127:     
 128:     cdef np.float64_t t_cur = r_l * l_cur - x_l
 129:     cdef np.float64_t t_next = r_l * l_next - x_l
 130: 
 131:     cdef np.complex128_t r0, r1, r2, r3
 132:     r0, r1, r2, r3 = solve_quartic_equation(r_sum * a**2, -2 * M_PI * b, 2 * c * (r_sum * a - M_PI), 0, r_sum * c**2)
 133:     cdef np.complex128_t critical_t[6]
 134:     # Boundary + roots of the derivative
 135:     critical_t[:] = [t_cur, t_next, r0, r1, r2, r3]
 136:     
 137:     cdef int i = 0
 138:     # Temporary variables
 139:     cdef np.float64_t t, s, NLL
 140:     # Local minimum variables
 141:     cdef np.float64_t t_loc_min, s_loc_min, NLL_loc_min
 142:     NLL_loc_min = INFINITY
 143:     for i in range(6):
 144:         # We do not want complex roots
 145:         if abs(critical_t[i].imag) > 1e-8:
 146:             continue
 147: 
 148:         t = critical_t[i].real
 149:         # Roots should lie within [t_cur, t_next] interval
 150:         if t < t_cur or t > t_next:
 151:             continue
 152:         
 153:         if abs(t) < 1e-8:
 154:             s = 0
 155:         else:
 156:             s = (a * t**2 + c) / (sqrt(2*M_PI) * t)
 157:         
 158:         if abs(s) < 1e-8:
 159:             NLL = r_sum * log(-a*t + b)
 160:         else:
 161:             NLL = r_sum * log(sqrt(2*M_PI) * s - a*t + b) + (a * t**2 + c) / (2 * s**2)
 162: 
 163:         if NLL < NLL_loc_min:
 164:             t_loc_min = t
 165:             s_loc_min = s
 166:             NLL_loc_min = NLL
 167: 
 168:     cdef np.float64_t l_loc_min = (t_loc_min + x_l) / r_l
 169:     cdef np.float64_t h_loc_min = (x_l + x_h - r_l * l_loc_min) / r_h
 170: 
 171:     return (l_loc_min, h_loc_min, s_loc_min, NLL_loc_min)
 172: 
 173:     
 174: @cython.cdivision(True)
 175: @cython.boundscheck(False)
 176: @cython.wraparound(False)
 177: def minimize_NLL(
 178:         np.ndarray[np.float64_t, ndim=1] data, 
 179:         np.ndarray[np.float64_t, ndim=1] weights
 180:     ):
 181:     # Total number of points
 182:     cdef long int N = data.shape[0]
 183:     # Summary weight
 184:     cdef np.float64_t r_sum = np.sum(weights)
 185:     
 186:     # Region indexers (u is a number of l axis, v is a number of h axis)
 187:     cdef long int u = 0
 188:     cdef long int v = N - 1
 189:     # Global counter
 190:     cdef long int i = 0
 191:     
 192:     # Coordinates of current segment's left-top point
 193:     cdef np.float64_t l_cur = data[0]
 194:     cdef np.float64_t h_cur = data[0]
 195:     # Coordinates of current segment's bottom-right point (or left-top coordinates for the next segment)
 196:     cdef np.float64_t l_next
 197:     cdef np.float64_t h_next
 198:     
 199:     # Sum of weights for l and h
 200:     cdef np.float64_t r_l = weights[0]
 201:     cdef np.float64_t r_h = weights[N - 1]
 202:     
 203:     # Weighted sum of x's for l and h
 204:     cdef np.float64_t x_l = weights[0] * data[0]
 205:     cdef np.float64_t x_h = weights[N - 1] * data[N - 1]
 206:     
 207:     # Weighted sum of x squares for l and h
 208:     cdef np.float64_t x_sq_l = weights[0] * data[0]**2
 209:     cdef np.float64_t x_sq_h = weights[N - 1] * data[N - 1]**2
 210:     
 211:     # Local minimums
 212:     cdef np.float64_t l_loc_min, h_loc_min, s_loc_min, NLL_loc_min
 213:     # Global minimums
 214:     cdef np.float64_t l_glob_min, h_glob_min, s_glob_min, NLL_glob_min
 215:     NLL_glob_min = INFINITY
 216:     
 217:     # Traverse extremal chain from l = min(data), h = max(data) to l = h
 218:     while v - u >= 1:
 219:         # First, determine coordinates l_next and h_next
 220:         if v - u > 1:
 221:             l_next = min(data[u + 1], (x_l + x_h - r_h * data[v - 1]) / r_l)
 222:             h_next = max(data[v - 1], (x_l + x_h - r_l * data[u + 1]) / r_h)
 223:         else:
 224:             l_next = (x_l + x_h) / (r_l + r_h)
 225:             h_next = l_next
 226:         
 227:         # Then, find local minimum on current segment
 228:         l_loc_min, h_loc_min, s_loc_min, NLL_loc_min = optimize_NLL_on_segment(
 229:             r_sum, r_l, r_h,
 230:             x_l, x_h,
 231:             x_sq_l, x_sq_h,
 232:             l_cur, l_next
 233:         )
 234:         # Compare with current global minimum
 235:         if NLL_loc_min < NLL_glob_min:
 236:             l_glob_min = l_loc_min
 237:             h_glob_min = h_loc_min
 238:             s_glob_min = s_loc_min
 239:             NLL_glob_min = NLL_loc_min
 240:         
 241:         # Finally, move to the next segment
 242:         if l_next == data[u + 1]:
 243:             r_l += weights[u + 1]
 244:             x_l += weights[u + 1] * data[u + 1]
 245:             x_sq_l += weights[u + 1] * data[u + 1]**2
 246:             u += 1
 247:         else:
 248:             r_h += weights[v - 1]
 249:             x_h += weights[v - 1] * data[v - 1]
 250:             x_sq_h += weights[v - 1] * data[v - 1]**2
 251:             v -= 1
 252: 
 253:         l_cur, h_cur = l_next, h_next
 254:         i += 1
 255: 
 256:     return (l_glob_min, h_glob_min, s_glob_min, NLL_glob_min)
 257: '''
 258:

 260: @cython.boundscheck(False)
 261: @cython.wraparound(False)
